title: T1: Canonical LLM schema + audit
description:
Goal: Define a single canonical LLM tracking schema and identify/removal list for legacy tags/metrics.
Deliverables:
- Inventory of current tag/metric usage in backend + UI (what reads what).
- Canonical schema list (tags + metrics + provider-specific optional fields).
- Legacy fields to remove (no backward compatibility) and replacement mapping.
Test requirements:
- None (planning task).
Acceptance:
- Canonical schema is explicit and ready to drive tests + implementation.

title: T2: Tests for canonical LLM normalization
description:
Goal: Add failing tests that define the canonical mapping for OpenAI, Claude, Gemini, and Bedrock usage.
Deliverables:
- New/updated unit tests covering normalization output for each provider.
- Tests assert canonical tags (llm.model, llm.provider) and metrics (llm.tokens.* , llm.cost_usd, llm.latency_ms).
Test requirements:
- Unit: tests/test_llm_normalization.py (or tests/test_llm.py) with provider fixtures.
Acceptance:
- Tests fail against current implementation and describe the desired canonical schema.

title: T3: Implement LLM normalization layer
description:
Goal: Implement canonical normalization and update tracking to emit only the new schema.
Deliverables:
- Normalization functions mapping provider responses to canonical metrics/tags.
- track_llm uses normalization output and logs only llm.* tags/metrics.
- Conversation accumulator updated to aggregate canonical metrics.
- Legacy tag/metric emission removed (no backward compatibility).
Test requirements:
- Unit: T2 tests passing.
Acceptance:
- All canonical schema tests pass; no legacy fields are emitted.

title: T4: Align UI analytics to canonical LLM schema
description:
Goal: Remove UI fallbacks and rely exclusively on canonical llm.* tags/metrics.
Deliverables:
- UI analytics components read only llm.model, llm.provider, llm.tokens.* and llm.cost_usd.
- Remove legacy metric/tag fallbacks and dead paths.
Test requirements:
- Manual: spot-check analytics pages with sample LLM runs.
Acceptance:
- UI renders correctly using only canonical fields.

title: T5: Prune legacy LLM API surface + examples
description:
Goal: Remove stale LLM APIs and examples that no longer match the canonical schema.
Deliverables:
- Remove or replace LLMTracker stubs and any non-existent helpers (log_llm_usage, extractors).
- Update README/docs/examples to match the actual LLM API surface.
Test requirements:
- Unit: existing LLM tests updated as needed.
Acceptance:
- No docs/examples reference removed APIs; codebase has no unused LLM stubs.
